frontmatter.title: Get MFA factors information
frontmatter.description: Returns information about the auth factors of the current user and refreshes the related session claim

frontmatter.title: List TOTP devices
frontmatter.description: List the TOTP devices of the current user

frontmatter.title: Create TOTP device
frontmatter.description: Creates an unverified totp device

frontmatter.title: Remove TOTP device
frontmatter.description: Removes a totp device

frontmatter.title: Verify TOTP device
frontmatter.description: Checks that the TOTP sent in the body belongs to the totp device (specified by deviceName, belonging to the session user)

frontmatter.title: Verify TOTP code
frontmatter.description: Checks that the TOTP sent in the body belongs to a verified totp device of the session user

frontmatter.description: Finish sign in/up process with passwordless

Check if an email exists

frontmatter.description: Get enabled login methods: Returns recipes with their enabled setting and recipe specific configuration.

frontmatter.description: Checks if an email is verified and adds this information into the access token payload as well

frontmatter.title: Get OpenID config
frontmatter.description: Get OpenID discovery configuration

frontmatter.title: Continue OAuth login
frontmatter.description: Continues the OAuth2 login flow after the login page

frontmatter.title: Start OAuth login
frontmatter.description: Starts the OAuth2 login flow - for a detailed description of all input parameters please see the OAuth2 and OpenID Connect Core specs

frontmatter.title: Exchange OAuth grant
frontmatter.description: Exchanges an OAuth2 grant (e.g.: authorization code) for an access token (and optionally a refresh/id token) - for a detailed description of all input parameters please see the OAuth2 and OpenID Connect Core specs

frontmatter.title: Get OAuth user info
frontmatter.description: Retrieves user information based on the access token passed in the authorization header

frontmatter.title: Revoke OAuth token
frontmatter.description: Revokes an access/refresh token - the client id and secret can also be provided in an authorization header using the Basic scheme

frontmatter.title: Introspect OAuth token
frontmatter.description: Introspects an access/refresh token

frontmatter.title: End OAuth session
frontmatter.description: Redirects the user to a page where they can log out and revoke the oauth tokens - for a detailed description of input parameters please see the user initiated logout spec

frontmatter.title: End session redirect
frontmatter.description: Redirects the user to a page where they can log out and revoke the oauth tokens

frontmatter.title: Get OAuth login info
frontmatter.description: Retrieves information about the OAuth2 login

frontmatter.title: Logout OAuth user
frontmatter.description: Logs out the user and revokes the access/refresh tokens based on the id_token_hint passed to the end_session endpoint

frontmatter.title: Test authentication
frontmatter.description: Use this endpoint to check if your request are authenticated properly.
